pdesc: The navy blue Rayon fabric drapes gracefully, enveloping you in luxurious comfort. Its rich hue exudes sophistication, elevating your style and commanding attention wherever you go.

Crafted with precision and passion, Rumi embodies the essence of sophistication and grace. This ensemble showcases the finest Rayon fabric, ensuring a luxurious and comfortable wearing experience. The Mul Mul stripes add a touch of uniqueness, infusing the design with a contemporary twist.

Made with premium quality Rayon fabric, this ensemble is designed to provide both style and comfort. The two-tone navy blue and grey pinstripes add a touch of sophistication to the outfit, making it perfect for any formal or semi-formal event.

Introducing our exquisite Mul Mul Modal Dress, a perfect blend of style and comfort. Crafted with utmost care, this dress showcases a charming combination of polka dots and stripes, creating a playful yet sophisticated look. The vibrant mustard yellow hue adds a pop of color, making it a standout piece in any wardrobe.
Crafted with meticulous care, this captivating creation features red loop and buttons detail on the side, Mul Mul stripes, navy blue Rayon fabric, and a matching dupatta.

Immerse yourself in the enchanting allure of Anaya – a masterpiece that harmonizes sophistication and tranquility. Crafted with utmost care, this ensemble features graceful bell sleeves, luxurious blue Rayon fabric, captivating potli buttons, and a mesmerizing blue and white dupatta.

Introducing our beautiful beige malai cotton  fabric dress - a must-have addition to your wardrobe. This stunning dress boasts a rich and vibrant shade of blue that is sure to make you stand out from the crowd. Made from the highest quality malai cotton  fabric, this dress feels luxuriously soft and drapes beautifully on any body type.

Rehana Basheer presents the Jannah Collection -”a mesmerizing symphony of tradition and luxury. Crafted from exquisite pink dupion silk, each piece is adorned with hand embroidery and intricate Kundan stone work, reflecting timeless artistry and opulence.
